__e: Just tell me, I'll do anything, I swear.
Here, take this. When you need more, just say so. I'm making plenty.
Tell me where is it, or find your brother.
If you can't get me out of here, tell me now, because time is running out. Huh? !
If you know anything that would help us find the people behind this, tell me now.
If it's too late, Sam, tell me, and I'll leave you to get on with the rest of your life.
Please, Dad, if you're there, if you're anywhere, you just tell me and I will find you.
The next time you want to kill yourself, tell me and I'll do it!
Please, Dad, if you're there, if you're anywhere, you just tell me and I will find you.
You got somethin' you wanna do so bad you'll risk your life, you tell me. We'll do it- my way, on my time, or we're gonna have a problem.
The next time you want to kill yourself, tell me and I'll do it!
